商品名稱: TUNEVUSE 男款花朵襯衫短袖休閒花卉印花鈕扣夏威夷襯衫 100% 純棉
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: 粉紅色
留言內容: I am a female who is 5’10 and 185lbs. I typically wear a large because of my muscular/ athletic build. I love being androgynous and a shirt like this complimented my physique well. I got many compliments about the shirts design and how well it fit. It’s not too tight but fit in a more “slim” manner. I had enough room to fit comfortably. True to size.

商品名稱: TUNEVUSE 男款花朵襯衫短袖休閒花卉印花鈕扣夏威夷襯衫 100% 純棉
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: 黑色
留言內容: Grade: B+This was a honeymoon purchase. I was looking for a fresh shirt I could wear casually by the pool and then to a nice dinner. It totally fits the bill. Fit wise I think it’s true to size. A little scratchy but it’s a cheaper shirt at the end of the day. It was perfect for the climate and gave that relaxed, formal look.TLDR: Black floral Hawaiin shirt was a fun buy for by the pool at the resort.

留言內容: As others have stated it shrinks in the wash - that was fine for me since a Large was just a little big for me. I have several Asian-fashion-floral-shirts from Amazon and I always get compliments on them, but with all the others the colors are little more subdued - this is almost like a novelty Hawaiian shirt in its brightness.  Not a deal-breaker, but this will not be one of my top go-to's for the summer, more something to wear to the pool/casual friend gathering.
